abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission now has a new judicial critic in federal court in Manhattan: Judge William H. Pauley III.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission now has a new judicial critic in federal court in Manhattan: Judge William H. Pauley III.
lead_paragraph: An unusually hostile ruling emerged from a Manhattan courtroom last week, when a federal judge lashed out at the Securities and Exchange Commission for weak oversight. It was unusual, only because its author was not Judge Jed S. Rakoff.

headline.main: Another Federal Judge Takes the S.E.C. to Task
